name: Homemade Marshmallow Bald Eagles
author: SHORECOOK
summary: These cute little eagles made with marshmallows, coconut, and chocolate can be served on their own or used as cupcake toppers. A treat not just for Philadelphia Eagles fans - they are a great dessert on patriotic holidays like 4th of July.
ingredients: 1 (12 ounce) package confectioners' coating (such as Wilton® Candy Melts®)
directions: Place white confectioners' coating in the top of a double boiler over simmering water
Stir frequently, scraping down the sides with a rubber spatula to avoid scorching, until chocolate is melted, about 5 minutes
Insert a toothpick into the marshmallows and dip them into the melted white chocolate
Then roll in coconut and place on the mint sandwich cookie
Using kitchen shears, cut a slit and place a cashew where the beak should go
Using a toothpick, draw a dot with a line over it on each side of the eagle's head for the eyes
